title: Short Story Competition
text: Have you got a great story to tell, real or imagined? Then why not put pen to paper, or rather your fingers to your keyboard, and enter our short story competition.
This years competition is open to all ages
Your stories need to be submitted by noon on 15th September 2018. The winners will be announced in the Library on Saturday 13th October 2018.

link.text: Follow this link for more information

title: National Libraries Week
text: We are in the process of planning a programme of events

title: FoSCL Quiz Night
text: We are repeating our very successful Quiz.

This year it will be held in the School Hall. Our Quiz masters will provide a great range of interesting questions. We will have a bar with wine, beer, soft drinks and nibbles available. There will be a raffle with a variety of wonderful prizes.
tickets: Tickets will go on sale at the Library or Occasions from 1st September 2018.
